An upcoming television series is being written and developed by Nick and Carlton Cuse for Lucasfilm as part of the Star Wars franchise.
Nick and Carlton Cuse had begun early development on a Star Wars television series in April 2025.
Production
Development
Writer Carlton Cuse and his son Nick were in early development on an unspecified Star Wars television series in April 2025, which would be their first formal project together. Carlton Cuse had previously discussed potential television series to work on with Lucasfilm when he had a deal with ABC Studios, which is also owned by Disney.
}}
